ISSUE.TITLE: More options on vendor details page. Vendor address
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: storefront - link to the vendors main informaton page products - link to all the specific vendors products customer comments - usefull way of highlighting this (without the complexity of ebay or amazon style feedback) terms & conditions - vendor conditions returns - vendors returns policy delivery - vendors delivery policy Contact and Address details Good example: http://www.notonthehighstreet.com/mariaallenjewellery I think Vendor contact details should be taken in a controlled way (like customer registration) so that it can be displayed uniformly in the public store (which i think is best practice) - otherwise, every vendor could have their contact details displayed differently and a customer has to search for the the details vendor business name : vendor name : vendor description : ( text editor ) vendor street address 1 : vendor street address 2 : vendor town : vendor country : vendor postcode : ( maybe as a link to google maps target="_blank" ) vendor telephone number : vendor mobile telephone number : vendor email address : ( :mailto ) vendor website : ( target="_blank" ) Storeowner should be able to decide whether the 'vendor website' should be displayed - storeowner might not want outgoing links --- Regarding address. Allow vendors to have address details. It would be editable in admin area (vendor details page) and public store (my account > vendor info). It could be also entered when applying to vendor account (public store). We'll store it into "Address" entity. "Vendor" account will have "AddressId" property (without navigation property). Let's just discuss which exactly values will vendors be allowed to enter and which ones will be required Let's also add a vendor setting indicating whether this data should be displayed in public store on a vendor details page - "Display vendor address" Source: http://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/t/28316/vendor-page.aspx#117992

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #468 Allow a store owner to specify address of vendors
